title: Hello World
content: Hello, My name is Christopher EnyTC. I have 20 years old and i'm passionate about programming and innovative technologies, spend my day listening to music, studying something interesting or working on some project. In this blog I will be passing everything I know and things of day-to-day life of a programmer. Currently I'm working on a project called Jakll.js and also write articles for NLabs. I love NodeJS, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Python, JavaScript, jQuery and AngularJS, mainly MongoDB NoSQL enthusiast. Welcome to my world.
